name: nativescript-http-formdata
description: A NativeScript plugin to post/upload file as multipart/form-data to server.

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-http-formdata && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
